title: 20 Funniest Lol-Worthy Cat Memes of the Week From Your 'I Can Has Cheezburger' Feline Family (April 11, 2025)
description: Goooooood meowrning, feline fam! We're pawsitively bursting with joy because it is… what? Say it with us - it's Furrrriday! Thanks Ceiling Cat, we literally could not survive another day in the office. We're ready to put our paws up and get into the weekend mode with a cat in one hand and a bunch of hilarious feline funnies in the other. But you - don't you lift one tiny toe bean - we've got you covered. Because it's Furiday and we feel like celebrating, we're sending you a gift of the funniest lol-worthy cat memes a day before Caturday!These memes have been made by feline fans just like you - they're cat owners, obsessed with cats just as much as you (but not as much as us), and they know how to make us laugh with the power of cat comedy. So you can breathe easily, and rest assured that from this second on, you're in good paws. Enjoy these memes and have a great weekend!
author: Blake Seidel

html:
Goooooood meowrning, feline fam! We're pawsitively bursting with joy because it is… what? Say it with us - it's Furrrriday! Thanks Ceiling Cat, we literally could not survive another day in the office. We're ready to put our paws up and get into the weekend mode with a cat in one hand and a bunch of hilarious feline funnies in the other. But you - don't you lift one tiny toe bean - we've got you covered. Because it's Furiday and we feel like celebrating, we're sending you a gift of the funniest lol-worthy cat memes a day before Caturday!

These memes have been made by feline fans just like you - they're cat owners, obsessed with cats just as much as you (but not as much as us), and they know how to make us laugh with the power of cat comedy. So you can breathe easily, and rest assured that from this second on, you're in good paws. Enjoy these memes and have a great weekend!
